attributes.action: support the fight against internet censorship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Internet sites should not be censored purely because the content is not liked by others, or because some people disagree with the content held by the site. If this  censorship is allowed to continue then soon different religious web sites will fight for the other to be closed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
